title: Download Super Slow
body:
I'm downloading LOL for the first time. The patch update download went pretty quickly.The game download is super slow. It's been maybe 2 hours and it's barely at 22%. My internet is fine, I've downloaded huge file sizes before, relatively quickly. Is it worth waiting? Or should I just give up. 

I use a late 2015 Mac Air 13". It's up to date, it did a system update this morning around 8am.

Here's a screenshot of my current screen: 
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-sZYqLmQN-SM2tTQ0dBWXByMkk/view?usp=sharing

replies.body: Welcome to League of Legends! Your Patcher is getting stuck because a firewall is getting in the way, or a background program! Not a huge deal though. With the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) it should locate the issue and get you patched up with no issues. Reach back out to me though if you do have issues.
Any tips for Mac users? I'm getting the same slowness
